subtitle: A spicy dish that makes ordinary potato wedges seem dull. Use good quality old potatoes like Cyprus or King Edwards for this.

method.text: Scrub potatoes and cut into fairly thick wedges. Cook in boiling water for 1-2 min. Drain well.
Heat oil in roasting tin and fry spices for 30 seconds. Add potatoes and stir well to coat.
Cook in oven for 25 min, stirring once half-way through cooking. Stir in mushrooms, corn and leeks and cook for further 20 min. Stir, sprinkle cheese over the top and cook for 5 min.

title: Spicy potato wedges with mushrooms
